routinesteps.description: Brush your beard and mustache with a comb.
routinesteps.title: Preparation

routinesteps.description:
Attach the OneBlade comb and set to 5mm. 

Trim against the hair growth across the whole beard and mustache.
routinesteps.title: Face Trim

routinesteps.description:
Hold the OneBlade slightly angled to the skin. 

Start from one of the lip picks in the center and go to corner of your mouth.
routinesteps.title: Mustache

routinesteps.description: Brush your beard and mustache with a comb.
routinesteps.title: Preparation

routinesteps.description:
Attach the OneBlade comb and set to 5mm. 

Trim against the hair growth across the whole beard and mustache.
routinesteps.title: Face Trim

routinesteps.description:
Remove the OneBlade comb. 

Tilt your head back while looking at your phone. 

Shave off hair below the line. 

Start at the center and create the neckline by using short strokes and trim towards the corner of the jaw
routinesteps.title: Neckline

routinesteps.description:
Start from earlobe, hold the Oneblade perpendicular to create a line. 

Use short strokes and trim towards the center of your face. 

Shave off everything above the line
routinesteps.title: Cheekline

routinesteps.description:
Hold the OneBlade slightly angled to the skin. 

Start from one of the lip picks in the center and go to corner of your mouth.
routinesteps.title: Mustache
